name: places/ChIJuavm-EJZwokRE61wyORxumQ
formattedAddress: 509 W 54th St, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 509 W 54th St, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: Extremely disappointed with the unreliable service at this parking garage. Despite their stated closing time of 12 o'clock, I arrived at 11:20, stood freezing outside, ringing the bell for a good 20 minutes with no response. The unprofessionalism and lack of accountability were astounding. Management needs to address this serious issue immediately

text.text: Extremely disappointed with the unreliable service at this parking garage. Despite their stated closing time of 12 o'clock, I arrived at 11:20, stood freezing outside, ringing the bell for a good 20 minutes with no response. The unprofessionalism and lack of accountability were astounding. Management needs to address this serious issue immediately

originalText.text: I used this garage because my family and I was going on a cruise. They priced me one thing and charged me an additional $105 when I got there saying my car was oversized. They knew I had no choice and speaking to other people who parked there for the cruise state the same thing. Last minute they charged them additional. Do not use this garage. I was quoted $288 but ended up paying nearly $400! Stay away, find somewhere else.

text.text: I used this garage because my family and I was going on a cruise. They priced me one thing and charged me an additional $105 when I got there saying my car was oversized. They knew I had no choice and speaking to other people who parked there for the cruise state the same thing. Last minute they charged them additional. Do not use this garage. I was quoted $288 but ended up paying nearly $400! Stay away, find somewhere else.

originalText.text: DO NOT PARK HERE. When we returned to pick up our car, we waited for 20 minutes by the counter, ringing the bell several times. Other potential customers came and went. So I walked down the ramp into the parking area to find several cars on with their doors open (??) and the attendant in one of them, yelling at me “What do you want?!” I said “do you work here?” With my ticket in my hand. He replied forcefully “Do YOU work here?”… so at this point I’m annoyed and confused and the way he’s acting, he may have just murdered the actual attendant and was in the process of stealing one of the cars. So I walk back up the ramp, and he comes driving up in my car, but before he gets out and gives me the keys he says “This your car?? You want it- $500.” So now I’m even more convinced he’s a thief and I’m seconds away from calling 911. But I’m a nice guy so I said “That’s a funny joke. Please come up here and let us pay.” We paid cash and left as quickly as possible.

originalText.text: PREPAID a RESERVED SPOT on SpotHero. Was told “we’re full” and to cancel the reservation. Could not cancel since it had already started. No respect for anyone, park literally anywhere else

originalText.text: Parking attendant is combative and unprofessional.  After 12hrs of treatment at MSK he went back and forth with me at the parking lot over pricing. Whatever happen to customer's rights or satisfaction? Management MIA!
